name: Spaced (JoleEh)
description:
The earthlings are under attack by meteoroids! The metoroid-keepers keep the meteoroids at bay and are recruiting new recruits. They require extraordinary will and stubbornness as this game may be a bit though at times. Do you have what it takes?

This game requires at least 10 minutes of free time for the best experience.

A/W/DMoveSPACEShootSHIFTLaserEMap+/-Zoom
